# Kyora Agents

Source of truth: `.github/agents/*.agent.md`.

## Available Agents

- `ai-architect.agent.md` — Instruction/prompt/agent system optimization
- `backend.agent.md` — Go monolith backend development
- `frontend.agent.md` — Portal-web React (TanStack) development
- `fullstack.agent.md` — End-to-end backend + portal-web work
- `ui-designer.agent.md` — Design tokens + UI implementation guidance

## Tool Names (Canonical)

Use only these tool names in agent frontmatter:

- `read`, `edit`, `search`, `execute`, `web`, `todo`, `agent`, `vscode`

(Each agent may list a subset.)
